title: The Red Lion Pub
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, British, English, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Part of the Antic pub and bar group. Offers a variety of drinks and pub food. Kitchen is aware of vegan requirements for a meal and always have one of two veg options on the menu that can be made vegan, or call in advance to arrange a specially-made vegan meal. Host music events inside and out in its backyard.
